duck: "Easy" (Commodores song), also covered by Faith No More
easy definition: causing or involving little difficulty or discomfort.

wiki.text:
'Easy' may refer to:

In 'albums': *''Easy'' (The Easybeats album) *''Easy'' (Grant Green album)
*''Easy'' (Grinspoon album) *''Easy'' (Kelly Willis album) *''Easy'' (Marvin
Gaye and Tammi Terrell album) *''Easy'' (Ralph McTell album) *''Easy'' (Cowboy
Mouth album), by Cowboy Mouth

In 'songs': *"Easy" (Barenaked Ladies song) *"Easy" (Commodores song), also
covered by Faith No More *"Easy" (Deer Tick song) *"Easy" (Paula DeAnda song)
*"Easy" (Rascal Flatts song) *"Easy" (Sheryl Crow song) *"Easy" (Sugababes song)
*"Easy", by Groove Armada from [[Lovebox (album)|Lovebox]] *"Easy", by Matthew
Sweet from [[Earth (Matthew Sweet album)|Earth]] *"Easy", by Joanna Newsom from
"Have One on Me" *" Easy", by Mat Zo and DJ Porter Robinson

In 'other uses':
* Enhanced Avionics System (EASy), an avionics suite used on Dassault Falcon
  business jets
* Easy, a 2003 film starring Marguerite Moreau
* [[Easy!]], a 2011 Italian film
* A low difficulty level in video games
* A brand of the UK company easyGroup, including easyJet
* Easy (store) a South American home improvement chain
* Easy, a Swedish studio focused on free online games. *EASY Card (South
  Florida), a transport payment card in Florida, United States
